titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on AC electric motors of an output exceeding 74.6 W but not exceeding 105 W.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/23/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on AC electric motors of an output exceeding 74.6 W but not exceeding 105 W.
